text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: tense discussion among friends>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Zossimov: “One of her customers must have killed her.”  

Razumihin: “Not a doubt of it!”  

Raskolnikov: “Examining them? What then?”  

---

<setup: Raskolnikov's growing anxiety>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Zossimov: “How does he get hold of them?”  

Razumihin: “It must have been a cunning ruffian!”  

Raskolnikov: “What if it wasn’t?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** the old pawnbroker's possession, indicating the murder was likely committed by an inexperienced individual rather than a cunning criminal.
